title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 124.3 - Consolidation of charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 124.3 - Consolidation of charges

State Regulations

The administrative law judge may consolidate for hearing
some or all of the charges arising out of a single incident. At the close of
any hearing in which more than one charge was considered, the administrative
law judge will make a separate finding as to guilt or innocence on each charge
considered before looking at the motorist's record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
124.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
